June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  STEP ONE  ARCS: Advising Requirement Codes © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     ALL COURSES MUST HAVE AN ARC  •   COURSES WITH NO ARC ARE NOT RECOGNIZED BY AV.     COURSE SPECIFIC ARCS  •   USED FOR DIRECT EQUIVALENT REQUIREMENTS  •   USED FOR PRE-REQUISITES     PSYC 200 = PSYC200     ARTH 191 = ARTH191     REQUIREMENT TYPE SPECIFIC ARCS  •   USED FOR GENERIC REQUIREMENT (SEMINARS)  •   LAS 198 = LAS100  •   HNSM345 = HNSM300  ARCS © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  STEP TWO  AIMs: Institutional Advising Requirements © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc. June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  STEP THREE  TYPES: Roots/Groups/Courses.... © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     #ADMIN   A root of Courses not applicable to program (FIN)     *FREE   A root of Free Electives (CATCH OVERSIGHTS)     CRS   Courses     CUCRS   Courses that can be taken more than once     GROUP   A group of courses to choose from     NONCS   Non course Rule Based Update     OTHER   Other???     ROOT   Main Program Requirement for AIM (major/minor/concentration)     TCRT   A root defining total credit hours needed  TYPES © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc. June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     LOOKS FOR THE COURSE LEVEL ON THE COURSE AND COUNTSTHE COURSE  HOW DOES THE RULE WORK? © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  LOGIC BEHIND THIS RULE  STUDENT NEEDS THREE HONORS COURSES  COURSE LEVEL CAN BE PLACED ON COURSE IN CATALOG OR ON SECTION SCHEDULE IN CERTAIN TERM OR A COURSE SPECIFIC FOR ONE STUDENT  RULE COUNTS COURSES WITH THIS LEVEL AND WHEN THE STUDENT HAS THREE COURSES, THE REQUIREMENT IS MET. © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  EXI  What’s different? © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc. June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  QUESTION/COMMENTS/SUGGESTIONS FOR AV  ADVISING NEEDS FEEDBACK TO MAKE CHANGES/ENHANCEMENTS TO IMPROVE FUNCTIONALITY © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Assign Aims by division     Delete more than one course at a time     When changing print order minimizes aim     Give options on grad report window to choose expected grad year and term  TAKE AWAYS AND FEEDBACK FOR JENZABAR © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.
